content.question:
All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:

Two dashed vertical lines parallel to the y axis are drawn at x equals negative 3 pi over 2 and x equals 3 pi over 2.

A point labeled (3.545 comma 0.813) is marked on the graph of the function.

The curve begins approximately at the bottom near to the right of the first dashed vertical line, x equals negative 3 pi over 2 in quadrant 3, increases as the curve trends up steeply then gradually to the right, and passes through the origin.

The curve continues up gradually to the right through the point (3.545 comma 0.813), then turns up steeply and exits to the left of the second dashed vertical line, x = 3 pi over 2 at the top of quadrant 1.

The figure shows the graph of <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals a tan open parentheses b x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>tan</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="a"><semantics><mi>a</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are constants, in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The graph of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has two vertical asymptotes at <math alttext="x equals negative fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 2 end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and a point with coordinates given is on the graph of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are all solutions to <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0.813"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.813</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals 3.545 plus pi k"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.545</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

​​<math alttext="x equals 3.545 plus 2 pi k"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.545</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

​​<math alttext="x equals 3.545 plus 3 pi k"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.545</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

content.answer: ​​<math alttext="x equals 3.545 plus 3 pi k"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3.545</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>k</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is any integer

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
